physical_appearance: "A picture of a mechanical handheld game is depicted. This game comes in a detachable box that is predominantly green in colour. The name of the mechanical toy, ""Racketeer's Rally"" is printed on the front and sides of the box. A ""Made in Singapore"" statement is also stated at its bottom left hand corner. The game device has two white rotary buttons near the lower end
